headline: Show HN: We created our university as a Pokemon-style map
description:
[May not work on a mobile device]

Starting from quarantine, we started doing an online artwork each year for our annual tech/cult fest. This was the artwork for 2022.

Repository: https://github.com/Felicity-IIIT-Hyderabad/website-2022-map

The artwork for 2021 can be found here (a r/place style collaboration): https://the-wall.felicity.iiit.ac.in/
headline_zh-Hans: Show HN: 我们将我们的大学创建为一个口袋妖怪式的地图
